channel.title: [PI]help! [PI]
channel.description:
Hi, when i try to make arrows shafts on my [PI] source i get lagg and next log out. when i log in i see i got the shfts on inv... how i could fix this?
also my kalphite queen when i am going to attack her it say "your attacks dont affect the queen" i use melee, ranged and magic... no one can attack it... help please.

item.title: [PI]help! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

[quote=“ailuj, post:1, topic:400359”]Hi, when i try to make arrows shafts on my [PI] source i get lagg and next log out. when i log in i see i got the shfts on inv… how i could fix this?

also my kalphite queen when i am going to attack her it say “your attacks dont affect the queen”
i use melee, ranged and magic… no one can attack it… help please.[/quote]

About arrow shafts, what I know is that Fletching is messed up on PI, you need to fix it by yourself.

And about Kalphite Queen, on PI you need to use verac to “penetrate” the Protect prayers of queen, I think this is not the right section, you should ask Mods to move it to “Help” section.

Read full topic
